item.description:
Please join David Homa, in learning how to prune your apple trees while they are in winter dormancy in order to improve their ongoing health and productivity. Dave will be running this skillshare in Raymond.

 

 

The event will include discussion of techniques, common mistakes, suggested tools, and hands on pruning. Handouts provided. The session is expected to run about 2 1/2 hours.

Warm beverages provided.

Space is limited to 10

Dress in layers for the weather. Boots or snowshoes depending on snow pack would be helpful. Feel free to bring your hand pruners.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Hands on Apple Tree Pruning Workshop in Raymond
